item.title: No Muzzle Flash Lights
item.description: A simple mod that improves game performance in combat by disabling lights cast on the environment by muzzle flashes, which are very performance heavy in New Vegas and Fallout 3. The mod can be anywhere in your load order. New Vegas version does not take up a slot in the load order and comes with an .ini file in config/NMFL folder. By default, it only disables the lights for NPCs and leaves them on for the player.

item.title: Visual Objectives
item.description: Adds visual 3D markers for current quest objectives. A remake of Just Visual Objectives by yvileapsis in a FOSE plugin with no performance impact. Requirements: FOSE 1.3b2﻿ Command Extender Configuration: Edit F3VisualObjectives.ini file in Data/FOSE/Plugins. Download Source code Credits: yvileapsis ﻿for the original mod. jazzisparis﻿, luthien ﻿and lStewieAl ﻿for their work reverse-engineering New Vegas, which was essential for porting this mod. carxt ﻿for their implementation of WorldToScreen.
